trans-unit.source: Provides data for the events in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> control that change the position of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 为中的事件提供数据<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref>更改批注的位置的控件。

trans-unit.source: The AnnotationPositionChangingEventArgs class is used for the two annotation-positioning events, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged>, in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control.
trans-unit.target: AnnotationPositionChangingEventArgs 类用于两个批注定位事件，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged>中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationPositionChangingEventArgs.Annotation%2A> property gets the annotation object that is being positioned.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationPositionChangingEventArgs.Annotation%2A>属性获取所位于的批注对象。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationPositionChangingEventArgs.Annotation%2A>

trans-unit.source: This class also contains properties that retrieve the new location, width, height and anchor location of the annotation that is repositioned.
trans-unit.target: 此类还包含检索新位置、 宽度、 高度和定位点位置重新定位的批注的属性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.AnnotationPositionChangingEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.AnnotationPositionChangingEventArgs>类</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.AnnotationPositionChangingEventArgs>的新实例

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The Annotation property allows the developer to set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation> properties during the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control.
trans-unit.target: 批注属性允许开发人员设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation>期间属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged>的事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation"> </xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the new anchor location of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置批注的新的定位点位置。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> object that represents the new anchor position.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref>对象，表示新的定位点位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the new annotation anchor point X location.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置新的批注定位点 X 位置。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> events are raised, the NewAnchorLocationX property determines the new X coordinate of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>将引发事件，NewAnchorLocationX 属性确定新的批注的 X 坐标。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>

trans-unit.source: This information is useful when the annotation is newly anchored to a data point.
trans-unit.target: 当批注新定位到的数据点时，此信息很有用。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the new annotation anchor point X location.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref>值，该值表示新的批注定位点 X 位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the new annotation anchor point Y location.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置新的批注定位点的 Y 位置。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> events are raised, the NewAnchorLocationY property determines the new Y coordinate of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged>将引发事件，NewAnchorLocationY 属性确定批注的新的 Y 坐标。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>

trans-unit.source: This information is useful when the annotation is newly anchored to a data point.
trans-unit.target: 当批注新定位到的数据点时，此信息很有用。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value representing the new annotation anchor point Y location.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref>值，该值表示新的批注定位点的 Y 位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the new X coordinate location of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置新 X 批注的坐标位置。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> events are raised, the NewLocationX property defines the X-coordinate location of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged>将引发事件，NewLocationX 属性定义的批注的 X 坐标位置。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the new X coordinate location of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref>表示新的 X 坐标位置批注的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the new Y coordinate of the annotation location.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置批注位置的新 Y 坐标。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> events are raised, the NewLocationY property defines the Y-coordinate location of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged>将引发事件，NewLocationY 属性定义的批注的 Y 坐标位置。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the new Y coordinate of the annotation location.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref>值，该值表示批注位置的新 Y 坐标。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the new location and size of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的新位置和批注的大小。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the new height of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置批注的新高度。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> events are raised, use the NewSizeHeight property to determine the new height of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged>将引发事件，使用 NewSizeHeight 属性来确定新高度的批注。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>

trans-unit.source: This information can be used when you resize the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 当您调整批注，则可以使用此信息。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the new height of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref>表示批注的新高度的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the new width of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置批注的新宽度。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> events are raised, use the NewSizeWidth property to determine the new width of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged>将引发事件，NewSizeWidth 属性用于确定批注的新宽度。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging>

trans-unit.source: This information can be used when you resize the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 当您调整批注，则可以使用此信息。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the new width of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref>表示批注的新宽度的值。
